about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes China's North American P-51K Mustang fighter! Its high speed and effective boost will get you into the thick of battle in no time. Use its high maneuverability in horizontal turns to escape enemy fire and swiftly counterattack in response. This aircraft is the perfect choice for high-altitude combat and interception! In addition you will receive a decoration set, days of Premium account, and Steel Supply Crates with a chance to receive three guaranteed prizes: days of Premium Account, Premium aircraft, gold, Free XP, consumables, experimental equipment, pilots with free skill points, and materials. You will also get a thematic emblem that gives a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%)!

DLC Content:

  • North American P-51K Mustang, a Chinese Tier VII fighter

  • 1 Hangar slot

  • 1 crew trained to 100%

  • 1 paint scheme

  • 7 days of Premium Account

  • 5 Steel Supply Crates
detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

This bundle includes China's North American P-51K Mustang fighter! Its high speed and effective boost will get you into the thick of battle in no time. Use its high maneuverability in horizontal turns to escape enemy fire and swiftly counterattack in response. This aircraft is the perfect choice for high-altitude combat and interception! In addition you will receive a decoration set, days of Premium account, and Steel Supply Crates with a chance to receive three guaranteed prizes: days of Premium Account, Premium aircraft, gold, Free XP, consumables, experimental equipment, pilots with free skill points, and materials. You will also get a thematic emblem that gives a bonus (crew experience in each battle: +2%)!

DLC Content:

  • North American P-51K Mustang, a Chinese Tier VII fighter

  • 1 Hangar slot

  • 1 crew trained to 100%

  • 1 paint scheme

  • 7 days of Premium Account

  • 5 Steel Supply Crates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2xxx or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2ххх, AMD FX 8xxx / higherShaders 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT 512MB, Radeon HD 3870) / higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 1GB, Radeon HD 7870 / higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1280х768
